class="SLC_dflx SLC_aic lis_catop"><h2 style="display:inline;margin-top: -3px;" onclick="opencatPopup(306086722);">Category</h2><span style="display:none;" title="Edit Category" onclick="opencatPopup(306086722)" class="categediticon icon-sprite"></span><div class="chipsL1 SLC_dflx SLC_dflw SLC_tac"><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Debris Chutes" onclick="opencatPopup(306086722);">Debris Chutes</div><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Garbage Chutes" onclick="opencatPopup(306086722);">Garbage Chutes</div></div></div><div style="margin-top: 10px" class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(306086722)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_306086722" data-itemid="306086722" onclick="productdescpop(306086722)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">The MS Debris Chute is a durable and cost-effective waste disposal solution designed for safe and efficient removal of construction debris from multi-storey buildings. Made from MS (Mild Steel) drums, these chutes are strong, reusable, and capable of withstanding rough handling at construction sites.
Each chute section is made from a 200-liter MS drum with a 600 mm diameter, securely interconnected to form a vertical passage through which debris is safely directed downwards. This system helps maintain a clean and organized work environment while minimizing dust and noise during debris disposal.
Our MS Debris Chutes are fabricated from one-time-use chemical or oil drums, making them an economical and sustainable choice for builders and contractors. They require minimal maintenance and can be easily installed or dismantled as per site requirements.
Key Features Fabricated from strong and durable MS drums 600 mm diameter, suitable for high-volume debris flow Cost-effective and reusable so <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div id="desceditarea_306086722" data-itemid="306086722" class="dropdescPop"></div></div></div> <div class="specific" id="specificationDiv306086722"><h2 class="SLC_dflx SLC_aic lis_catop"><h2 style="display:inline;margin-top: -3px;" onclick="opencatPopup(151605020);">Category</h2><span style="display:none;" title="Edit Category" onclick="opencatPopup(151605020)" class="categediticon icon-sprite"></span><div class="chipsL1 SLC_dflx SLC_dflw SLC_tac"><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Organic Waste Converter" onclick="opencatPopup(151605020);">Organic Waste Converter</div><div class="addmorecat" onclick="opencatPopup(151605020)"><span class="addmoresign">+</span><span class="addmoretext">Add more</span></div></div></div><div style="margin-top: 10px" class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(151605020)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_151605020" data-itemid="151605020" onclick="productdescpop(151605020)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">The Rotary Drum Composter is a semi-automatic in-drum composting machine designed for efficient and large-scale organic waste management. It provides an eco-friendly solution for converting organic waste into high-quality compost through natural aerobic decomposition.
The machine consists of a horizontal cylindrical drum mounted on a sturdy frame with torsion wheels for smooth rotation. The drum rotates automatically with the help of a gearbox and motor-driven ring gear system, ensuring uniform mixing and aeration of waste materials. A blower system continuously supplies fresh air inside the drum to maintain aerobic conditions and eliminate foul odors.
Unlike heating-based systems, the Rotary Drum Composter operates without any heating element, making it energy-efficient and low-maintenance. The composting process typically takes 15 to 20 days, depending on the type of waste and environmental conditions. The drum remains closed during the process, and compost is removed through a manho <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div style="font-size:12px;display:inline; margin-left : 5px" id="grpselectmsg_151604812"></p></div></div><div class="product-mandate"><div class="mapped "><div style="gap: 7px" class="SLC_dflx SLC_aic lis_catop"><h2 style="display:inline;margin-top: -3px;" onclick="opencatPopup(151604812);">Category</h2><span style="display:none;" title="Edit Category" onclick="opencatPopup(151604812)" class="categediticon icon-sprite"></span><div class="chipsL1 SLC_dflx SLC_dflw SLC_tac"><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Food Waste Composting Machine" onclick="opencatPopup(151604812);">Food Waste Composting Machine</div><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Compost Equipment" onclick="opencatPopup(151604812);">Compost Equipment</div></div></div><div style="margin-top: 10px" class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(151604812)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_151604812" data-itemid="151604812" onclick="productdescpop(151604812)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">The Rotary Drum Composter is a semi-automatic in-drum composting machine designed for efficient and large-scale organic waste management. It provides an eco-friendly solution for converting organic waste into high-quality compost through natural aerobic decomposition.
The machine consists of a horizontal cylindrical drum mounted on a sturdy frame with torsion wheels for smooth rotation. The drum rotates automatically with the help of a gearbox and motor-driven ring gear system, ensuring uniform mixing and aeration of waste materials. A blower system continuously supplies fresh air inside the drum to maintain aerobic conditions and eliminate foul odors.
Unlike heating-based systems, the Rotary Drum Composter operates without any heating element, making it energy-efficient and low-maintenance. The composting process typically takes 15 to 20 days, depending on the type of waste and environmental conditions. The drum remains closed during the process, and compost is removed through a manho <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div style="font-size:12px;display:inline; margin-left : 5px" id="grpselectmsg_160129264"></p></div></div><div class="product-mandate"><div class="mapped "><div style="gap: 7px" class="SLC_dflx SLC_aic lis_catop"><h2 style="display:inline;margin-top: -3px;" onclick="opencatPopup(160129264);">Category</h2><span style="display:none;" title="Edit Category" onclick="opencatPopup(160129264)" class="categediticon icon-sprite"></span><div class="chipsL1 SLC_dflx SLC_dflw SLC_tac"><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Food Waste Composting Machine" onclick="opencatPopup(160129264);">Food Waste Composting Machine</div><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Compost Equipment" onclick="opencatPopup(160129264);">Compost Equipment</div></div></div><div style="margin-top: 10px" class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(160129264)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_160129264" data-itemid="160129264" onclick="productdescpop(160129264)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">The Rotary Drum Composter is a semi-automatic in-drum composting machine designed for efficient and large-scale organic waste management. It provides an eco-friendly solution for converting organic waste into high-quality compost through natural aerobic decomposition.
The machine consists of a horizontal cylindrical drum mounted on a sturdy frame with torsion wheels for smooth rotation. The drum rotates automatically with the help of a gearbox and motor-driven ring gear system, ensuring uniform mixing and aeration of waste materials. A blower system continuously supplies fresh air inside the drum to maintain aerobic conditions and eliminate foul odors.
Unlike heating-based systems, the Rotary Drum Composter operates without any heating element, making it energy-efficient and low-maintenance. The composting process typically takes 15 to 20 days, depending on the type of waste and environmental conditions. The drum remains closed during the process, and compost is removed through a manho <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div data-itemid="160129629" class="dropgrpPop"></div><span title="Organic Waste Composter" class="grpidrspan SLC_cp" id="grpidrspan_160129629" onclick="grouppop(160129629)">Organic Waste class="SLC_dflx SLC_aic lis_catop"><h2 style="display:inline;margin-top: -3px;" onclick="opencatPopup(160129629);">Category</h2><span style="display:none;" title="Edit Category" onclick="opencatPopup(160129629)" class="categediticon icon-sprite"></span><div class="chipsL1 SLC_dflx SLC_dflw SLC_tac"><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Food Waste Composting Machine" onclick="opencatPopup(160129629);">Food Waste Composting Machine</div><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Organic Waste Converter" onclick="opencatPopup(160129629);">Organic Waste Converter</div><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Compost Equipment" onclick="opencatPopup(160129629);">Compost Equipment</div></div></div><div style="margin-top: 10px" class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(160129629)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_160129629" data-itemid="160129629" onclick="productdescpop(160129629)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">The Rotary Drum Composter is a semi-automatic in-drum composting machine designed for efficient and large-scale organic waste management. It provides an eco-friendly solution for converting organic waste into high-quality compost through natural aerobic decomposition.
The machine consists of a horizontal cylindrical drum mounted on a sturdy frame with torsion wheels for smooth rotation. The drum rotates automatically with the help of a gearbox and motor-driven ring gear system, ensuring uniform mixing and aeration of waste materials. A blower system continuously supplies fresh air inside the drum to maintain aerobic conditions and eliminate foul odors.
Unlike heating-based systems, the Rotary Drum Composter operates without any heating element, making it energy-efficient and low-maintenance. The composting process typically takes 15 to 20 days, depending on the type of waste and environmental conditions. The drum remains closed during the process, and compost is removed through a manho <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div style="font-size:12px;display:inline; margin-left : 5px" id="grpselectmsg_160129268"></p></div></div><div class="product-mandate"><div class="mapped "><div style="gap: 7px" class="SLC_dflx SLC_aic lis_catop"><h2 style="display:inline;margin-top: -3px;" onclick="opencatPopup(160129268);">Category</h2><span style="display:none;" title="Edit Category" onclick="opencatPopup(160129268)" class="categediticon icon-sprite"></span><div class="chipsL1 SLC_dflx SLC_dflw SLC_tac"><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Food Waste Composting Machine" onclick="opencatPopup(160129268);">Food Waste Composting Machine</div><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Compost Equipment" onclick="opencatPopup(160129268);">Compost Equipment</div><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Organic Waste Converter" onclick="opencatPopup(160129268);">Organic Waste Converter</div></div></div><div style="margin-top: 10px" class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(160129268)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_160129268" data-itemid="160129268" onclick="productdescpop(160129268)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">
The Rotary Drum Composter is a semi-automatic in-drum composting machine designed for efficient and large-scale organic waste management. It provides an eco-friendly solution for converting organic waste into high-quality compost through natural aerobic decomposition.
The machine consists of a horizontal cylindrical drum mounted on a sturdy frame with torsion wheels for smooth rotation. The drum rotates automatically with the help of a gearbox and motor-driven ring gear system, ensuring uniform mixing and aeration of waste materials. A blower system continuously supplies fresh air inside the drum to maintain aerobic conditions and eliminate foul odors.
Unlike heating-based systems, the Rotary Drum Composter operates without any heating element, making it energy-efficient and low-maintenance. The composting process typically takes 15 to 20 days, depending on the type of waste and environmental conditions. The drum remains closed during the process, and compost is removed through a manh <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div data-itemid="160129292" class="dropgrpPop"></div><span title="Waste Compost Machines" class="grpidrspan SLC_cp" id="grpidrspan_160129292" onclick="grouppop(160129292)">Waste Compost Machines</span><p style="font-size:12px;display:inline; margin-left : 5px" id="grpselectmsg_160129292"></p></div></div><div class="product-mandate"><div class="mapped "><div style="gap: 7px" class="SLC_dflx SLC_aic lis_catop"><h2 style="display:inline;margin-top: -3px;" onclick="opencatPopup(160129292);">Category</h2><span style="display:none;" title="Edit Category" onclick="opencatPopup(160129292)" class="categediticon icon-sprite"></span><div class="chipsL1 SLC_dflx SLC_dflw SLC_tac"><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Food Waste Composting Machine" onclick="opencatPopup(160129292);">Food Waste Composting Machine</div><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Organic Waste Converter" onclick="opencatPopup(160129292);">Organic Waste Converter</div></div></div><div style="margin-top: 10px" class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(160129292)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_160129292" data-itemid="160129292" onclick="productdescpop(160129292)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">The Rotary Drum Composter is a semi-automatic in-drum composting machine designed for efficient and large-scale organic waste management. It provides an eco-friendly solution for converting organic waste into high-quality compost through natural aerobic decomposition.
The machine consists of a horizontal cylindrical drum mounted on a sturdy frame with torsion wheels for smooth rotation. The drum rotates automatically with the help of a gearbox and motor-driven ring gear system, ensuring uniform mixing and aeration of waste materials. A blower system continuously supplies fresh air inside the drum to maintain aerobic conditions and eliminate foul odors.
Unlike heating-based systems, the Rotary Drum Composter operates without any heating element, making it energy-efficient and low-maintenance. The composting process typically takes 15 to 20 days, depending on the type of waste and environmental conditions. The drum remains closed during the process, and compost is removed through a manho <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div Composter</span><p style="font-size:12px;display:inline; margin-left : 5px" id="grpselectmsg_306085811"></p></div></div><div class="product-mandate"><div class="mapped "><div style="gap: 7px" class="SLC_dflx SLC_aic lis_catop"><h2 style="display:inline;margin-top: -3px;" onclick="opencatPopup(306085811);">Category</h2><span style="display:none;" title="Edit Category" onclick="opencatPopup(306085811)" class="categediticon icon-sprite"></span><div class="chipsL1 SLC_dflx SLC_dflw SLC_tac"><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Food Waste Composting Machine" onclick="opencatPopup(306085811);">Food Waste Composting Machine</div><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Organic Waste Composter" onclick="opencatPopup(306085811);">Organic Waste Composter</div></div></div><div style="margin-top: 10px" class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(306085811)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_306085811" data-itemid="306085811" onclick="productdescpop(306085811)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">The Rotary Drum Composter is a semi-automatic in-drum composting machine designed for efficient and large-scale organic waste management. It provides an eco-friendly solution for converting organic waste into high-quality compost through natural aerobic decomposition.
The machine consists of a horizontal cylindrical drum mounted on a sturdy frame with torsion wheels for smooth rotation. The drum rotates automatically with the help of a gearbox and motor-driven ring gear system, ensuring uniform mixing and aeration of waste materials. A blower system continuously supplies fresh air inside the drum to maintain aerobic conditions and eliminate foul odors.
Unlike heating-based systems, the Rotary Drum Composter operates without any heating element, making it energy-efficient and low-maintenance. The composting process typically takes 15 to 20 days, depending on the type of waste and environmental conditions. The drum remains closed during the process, and compost is removed through a manho <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div id="desceditarea_306085811" data-itemid="306085811" class="dropdescPop"></div></div></div> <div class="specific" id="specificationDiv306085811"><h2 style="display:inline;" style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(290269567)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_290269567" data-itemid="290269567" onclick="productdescpop(290269567)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">We manufacture and supply high-quality Debris Chutes designed for safe and efficient disposal of construction and renovation waste from multi-storey buildings. Our chutes are lightweight, durable, and easy to install, providing a clean and cost-effective waste management solution for construction sites.
Available in PVC, MS (Mild Steel), and FRP materials, these chutes are ideal for transferring debris, dust, and waste directly from upper floors to ground-level collection areas, minimizing labor and maintaining site cleanliness.
Types of Debris Chutes: PVC Debris Chutes: Made from recycled oil or chemical drums 600 mm diameter, lightweight, and noise-reducing Best low-cost option for short-term projects MS Debris Chutes: Made from 200-liter MS drums (one-time-use chemical/oil drums) Strong, long-lasting, and easy to maintain Suitable for large-scale and long-term construction sites FRP Debris Chutes: Made from high-grade FRP material Corrosion-resistant, durable, and low maintenance Id <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div id="desceditarea_290269567" Composter</span><p style="font-size:12px;display:inline; margin-left : 5px" id="grpselectmsg_306086006"></p></div></div><div class="product-mandate"><div class="mapped "><div style="gap: 7px" class="SLC_dflx SLC_aic lis_catop"><h2 style="display:inline;margin-top: -3px;" onclick="opencatPopup(306086006);">Category</h2><span style="display:none;" title="Edit Category" onclick="opencatPopup(306086006)" class="categediticon icon-sprite"></span><div class="chipsL1 SLC_dflx SLC_dflw SLC_tac"><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Organic Waste Converter" onclick="opencatPopup(306086006);">Organic Waste Converter</div><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Food Waste Composting Machine" onclick="opencatPopup(306086006);">Food Waste Composting Machine</div></div></div><div style="margin-top: 10px" class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(306086006)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_306086006" data-itemid="306086006" onclick="productdescpop(306086006)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">The Rotary Drum Composter is a semi-automatic in-drum composting machine designed for efficient and large-scale organic waste management. It provides an eco-friendly solution for converting organic waste into high-quality compost through natural aerobic decomposition.
The machine consists of a horizontal cylindrical drum mounted on a sturdy frame with torsion wheels for smooth rotation. The drum rotates automatically with the help of a gearbox and motor-driven ring gear system, ensuring uniform mixing and aeration of waste materials. A blower system continuously supplies fresh air inside the drum to maintain aerobic conditions and eliminate foul odors.
Unlike heating-based systems, the Rotary Drum Composter operates without any heating element, making it energy-efficient and low-maintenance. The composting process typically takes 15 to 20 days, depending on the type of waste and environmental conditions. The drum remains closed during the process, and compost is removed through a manho <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div class="SLC_dflx SLC_aic lis_catop"><h2 style="display:inline;margin-top: -3px;" onclick="opencatPopup(306086094);">Category</h2><span style="display:none;" title="Edit Category" onclick="opencatPopup(306086094)" class="categediticon icon-sprite"></span><div class="chipsL1 SLC_dflx SLC_dflw SLC_tac"><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Food Waste Composting Machine" onclick="opencatPopup(306086094);">Food Waste Composting Machine</div><div class="addmorecat" onclick="opencatPopup(306086094)"><span class="addmoresign">+</span><span class="addmoretext">Add more</span></div></div></div><div style="margin-top: 10px" class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(306086094)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_306086094" data-itemid="306086094" onclick="productdescpop(306086094)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">The Rotary Drum Composter is a semi-automatic in-drum composting machine designed for efficient and large-scale organic waste management. It provides an eco-friendly solution for converting organic waste into high-quality compost through natural aerobic decomposition.
The machine consists of a horizontal cylindrical drum mounted on a sturdy frame with torsion wheels for smooth rotation. The drum rotates automatically with the help of a gearbox and motor-driven ring gear system, ensuring uniform mixing and aeration of waste materials. A blower system continuously supplies fresh air inside the drum to maintain aerobic conditions and eliminate foul odors.
Unlike heating-based systems, the Rotary Drum Composter operates without any heating element, making it energy-efficient and low-maintenance. The composting process typically takes 15 to 20 days, depending on the type of waste and environmental conditions. The drum remains closed during the process, and compost is removed through a manho <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div lis_catop"><h2 style="display:inline;margin-top: -3px;" onclick="opencatPopup(142364889);">Category</h2><span style="display:none;" title="Edit Category" onclick="opencatPopup(142364889)" class="categediticon icon-sprite"></span><div class="chipsL1 SLC_dflx SLC_dflw SLC_tac"><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Garbage Chutes" onclick="opencatPopup(142364889);">Garbage Chutes</div><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Steel Chutes" onclick="opencatPopup(142364889);">Steel Chutes</div></div></div><div style="margin-top: 10px" class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(142364889)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_142364889" data-itemid="142364889" onclick="productdescpop(142364889)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">AAKAAR GREEN LLP&nbsp;offers high-quality&nbsp;Garbage Chute Systems&nbsp;designed to streamline waste collection in high-rise buildings, hotels, hospitals, and commercial complexes. Our chutes provide a centralized, safe, and odor-free method of waste disposal, ensuring a cleaner environment and improved sanitation.
What is a Garbage Chute?
A garbage chute is a vertical duct system installed in multistoried buildings, enabling residents or staff to dispose of waste directly from each floor. The chute carries the waste to a centralized collection area at the ground level or basement, minimizing manual handling and maintaining hygiene throughout the building.
Key Features Stainless Steel: Made from high-grade materials for strength, durability, and corrosion resistance. Flame Retardant &amp; Leak-Proof Design: Ensures safety and avoids leakage or contamination. Bottom-Hinged / Side-Hinged Inlets: Easy to operate and ergonomically designed for user convenience on every floor. Odor Control System: Optional  <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div id="desceditarea_142364889" data-itemid="142364889" class="categediticon icon-sprite"></span><div class="chipsL1 SLC_dflx SLC_dflw SLC_tac"><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Garbage Chutes" onclick="opencatPopup(160130318);">Garbage Chutes</div><div class="addmorecat" onclick="opencatPopup(160130318)"><span class="addmoresign">+</span><span class="addmoretext">Add more</span></div></div></div><div style="margin-top: 10px" class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(160130318)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_160130318" data-itemid="160130318" onclick="productdescpop(160130318)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">AAKAAR GREEN LLP&nbsp;offers high-quality&nbsp;Garbage Chute Systems&nbsp;designed to streamline waste collection in high-rise buildings, hotels, hospitals, and commercial complexes. Our chutes provide a centralized, safe, and odor-free method of waste disposal, ensuring a cleaner environment and improved sanitation.
What is a Garbage Chute?
A garbage chute is a vertical duct system installed in multistoried buildings, enabling residents or staff to dispose of waste directly from each floor. The chute carries the waste to a centralized collection area at the ground level or basement, minimizing manual handling and maintaining hygiene throughout the building.
Key Features Stainless Steel: Made from high-grade materials for strength, durability, and corrosion resistance. Flame Retardant &amp; Leak-Proof Design: Ensures safety and avoids leakage or contamination. Bottom-Hinged / Side-Hinged Inlets: Easy to operate and ergonomically designed for user convenience on every floor. Odor Control System: Optional  <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div id="desceditarea_160130318" data-itemid="160130318" style="font-size:12px;display:inline; margin-left : 5px" id="grpselectmsg_151599951"></p></div></div><div class="product-mandate"><div class="mapped "><div style="gap: 7px" class="SLC_dflx SLC_aic lis_catop"><h2 style="display:inline;margin-top: -3px;" onclick="opencatPopup(151599951);">Category</h2><span style="display:none;" title="Edit Category" onclick="opencatPopup(151599951)" class="categediticon icon-sprite"></span><div class="chipsL1 SLC_dflx SLC_dflw SLC_tac"><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Garbage Chutes" onclick="opencatPopup(151599951);">Garbage Chutes</div><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Steel Chutes" onclick="opencatPopup(151599951);">Steel Chutes</div></div></div><div style="margin-top: 10px" class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(151599951)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_151599951" data-itemid="151599951" onclick="productdescpop(151599951)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">AAKAAR GREEN LLP&nbsp;offers high-quality&nbsp;Garbage Chute Systems&nbsp;designed to streamline waste collection in high-rise buildings, hotels, hospitals, and commercial complexes. Our chutes provide a centralized, safe, and odor-free method of waste disposal, ensuring a cleaner environment and improved sanitation.
What is a Garbage Chute?
A garbage chute is a vertical duct system installed in multistoried buildings, enabling residents or staff to dispose of waste directly from each floor. The chute carries the waste to a centralized collection area at the ground level or basement, minimizing manual handling and maintaining hygiene throughout the building.
Key Features Stainless Steel: Made from high-grade materials for strength, durability, and corrosion resistance. Flame Retardant &amp; Leak-Proof Design: Ensures safety and avoids leakage or contamination. Bottom-Hinged / Side-Hinged Inlets: Easy to operate and ergonomically designed for user convenience on every floor. Odor Control System: Optional  <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div id="desceditarea_151599951" data-itemid="151599951" id="descidrbtn_253019243" data-itemid="253019243" onclick="productdescpop(253019243)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover"> Introducing Aakaar Industries' Shredder Machine: the ultimate solution for efficient and secure shredding of various materials. Our shredder machine is meticulously designed and engineered to handle a wide range of materials, including paper, cardboard, plastics, and more, making it an indispensable tool for businesses, manufacturing facilities, recycling centers, and homes.
Crafted with precision and built to last, our shredder machine boasts a robust construction and high-quality components, ensuring durability and reliability even in the most demanding environments. Whether you need to shred confidential documents, packaging materials, or plastic waste, our shredder machine delivers consistent performance, day in and day out.
Efficiency is at the heart of our shredder machine's design. Equipped with advanced cutting mechanisms and powerful motors, our machine can process large volumes of material quickly and efficiently, saving you time and labor costs. class="categediticon icon-sprite"></span><div class="chipsL1 SLC_dflx SLC_dflw SLC_tac"><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Garbage Chutes" onclick="opencatPopup(151599447);">Garbage Chutes</div><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Industrial Chute" onclick="opencatPopup(151599447);">Industrial Chute</div></div></div><div style="margin-top: 10px" class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(151599447)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_151599447" data-itemid="151599447" onclick="productdescpop(151599447)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">AAKAAR GREEN LLP offers high-quality Garbage Chute Systems designed to streamline waste collection in high-rise buildings, hotels, hospitals, and commercial complexes. Our chutes provide a centralized, safe, and odor-free method of waste disposal, ensuring a cleaner environment and improved sanitation.
What is a Garbage Chute?
A garbage chute is a vertical duct system installed in multistoried buildings, enabling residents or staff to dispose of waste directly from each floor. The chute carries the waste to a centralized collection area at the ground level or basement, minimizing manual handling and maintaining hygiene throughout the building.
Key Features: Stainless Steel / Galvanized Iron Construction: Made from high-grade materials for strength, durability, and corrosion resistance. Flame Retardant &amp; Leak-Proof Design: Ensures safety and avoids leakage or contamination. Bottom-Hinged / Side-Hinged Inlets: Easy to operate and ergonomically designed for user convenience on every floor <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div id="desceditarea_151599447" data-itemid="151599447" class="dropdescPop"></div></div></div> <div class="specific" id="specificationDiv151599447"><h2 onclick="productdescpop(151599052)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">Introducing Aakaar Industries' Garbage Chutes: the efficient and hygienic solution for waste disposal in high-rise buildings and commercial complexes. Our garbage chutes are meticulously engineered to streamline waste management processes, offering convenience, cleanliness, and safety for residents and building occupants.
Designed for durability and reliability, our garbage chutes are constructed from high-quality materials, ensuring long-lasting performance even in the busiest environments. Whether it's residential apartments, office buildings, or hotels, our chutes can handle the daily disposal needs with ease.
Installation of our garbage chutes is hassle-free, thanks to our expert team of technicians who ensure seamless integration into your building's infrastructure. Once installed, our chutes provide a convenient and hygienic method for waste disposal, eliminating the need for manual handling and reducing the risk of cross-contamination and odors.

lis_catop"><h2 class="noclickel" style="display:inline;margin-top: -6px;">Category</h2><p><span title="Add Category" onclick="opencatPopup(151599823);" class="categeditbtn"><span class="emptyaddmoresign addmoresign">+</span>Add</span> <span> category to get buy leads from relevant customers</span></p></div><div style="margin-top: 10px" class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(151599823)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_151599823" data-itemid="151599823" onclick="productdescpop(151599823)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">AAKAAR GREEN LLP&nbsp;offers high-quality&nbsp;Garbage Chute Systems&nbsp;designed to streamline waste collection in high-rise buildings, hotels, hospitals, and commercial complexes. Our chutes provide a centralized, safe, and odor-free method of waste disposal, ensuring a cleaner environment and improved sanitation.
What is a Garbage Chute?
A garbage chute is a vertical duct system installed in multistoried buildings, enabling residents or staff to dispose of waste directly from each floor. The chute carries the waste to a centralized collection area at the ground level or basement, minimizing manual handling and maintaining hygiene throughout the building.
Key Features Stainless Steel: Made from high-grade materials for strength, durability, and corrosion resistance. Flame Retardant &amp; Leak-Proof Design: Ensures safety and avoids leakage or contamination. Bottom-Hinged / Side-Hinged Inlets: Easy to operate and ergonomically designed for user convenience on every floor. Odor Control System: Optional  <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div id="desceditarea_151599823" data-itemid="151599823" style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(142365719)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_142365719" data-itemid="142365719" onclick="productdescpop(142365719)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">Introducing Aakaar Industries' Garbage Chutes: the efficient and hygienic solution for waste disposal in high-rise buildings and commercial complexes. Our garbage chutes are meticulously engineered to streamline waste management processes, offering convenience, cleanliness, and safety for residents and building occupants.
Designed for durability and reliability, our garbage chutes are constructed from high-quality materials, ensuring long-lasting performance even in the busiest environments. Whether it's residential apartments, office buildings, or hotels, our chutes can handle the daily disposal needs with ease.
Installation of our garbage chutes is hassle-free, thanks to our expert team of technicians who ensure seamless integration into your building's infrastructure. Once installed, our chutes provide a convenient and hygienic method for waste disposal, eliminating the need for manual handling and reducing the risk of cross-contamination and odors.

class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(270809179)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_270809179" data-itemid="270809179" onclick="productdescpop(270809179)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">Getting Debris off the under-construction site is basically a material handling problemwhich not only results are loss of time and cost but it is distress for project engineer. Our&nbsp;Debris Chute is most efficient and cost-effective solution for above problem. Our Debris&nbsp;Chute eliminates dust and danger of flying debris on site, thus providing occupation safety to&nbsp;workmen. We have expertise to create drum debris chute for removal of construction debris safely.&nbsp;Removing of debris is harder task for site in-charge. The material of chute is made of MS&nbsp;or HDPE (empty Chemical Drums) and installed with strong holding support of MS frame&nbsp;which is fastening on ever floor. <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div id="desceditarea_270809179" data-itemid="270809179" class="dropdescPop"></div></div></div> <div class="specific" class="categediticon icon-sprite"></span><div class="chipsL1 SLC_dflx SLC_dflw SLC_tac"><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Garbage Chutes" onclick="opencatPopup(151598770);">Garbage onclick="productdescpop(151598770)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_151598770" data-itemid="151598770" onclick="productdescpop(151598770)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">AAKAAR GREEN LLP&nbsp;offers high-quality&nbsp;Garbage Chute Systems&nbsp;designed to streamline waste collection in high-rise buildings, hotels, hospitals, and commercial complexes. Our chutes provide a centralized, safe, and odor-free method of waste disposal, ensuring a cleaner environment and improved sanitation.
What is a Garbage Chute?
A garbage chute is a vertical duct system installed in multistoried buildings, enabling residents or staff to dispose of waste directly from each floor. The chute carries the waste to a centralized collection area at the ground level or basement, minimizing manual handling and maintaining hygiene throughout the building.
Key Features Stainless Steel: Made from high-grade materials for strength, durability, and corrosion resistance. Flame Retardant &amp; Leak-Proof Design: Ensures safety and avoids leakage or contamination. Bottom-Hinged / Side-Hinged Inlets: Easy to operate and ergonomically designed for user convenience on every floor. Odor Control System: Optional  <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div id="desceditarea_151598770" data-itemid="151598770" ultimate solution for efficient and secure shredding of various materials. Our shredder machine is meticulously designed and engineered to handle a wide range of materials, including paper, cardboard, plastics, and more, making it an indispensable tool for businesses, manufacturing facilities, recycling centers, and homes.
Crafted with precision and built to last, our shredder machine boasts a robust construction and high-quality components, ensuring durability and reliability even in the most demanding environments. Whether you need to shred confidential documents, packaging materials, or plastic waste, our shredder machine delivers consistent performance, day in and day out.
Efficiency is at the heart of our shredder machine's design. Equipped with advanced cutting mechanisms and powerful motors, our machine can process large volumes of material quickly and efficiently, saving you time and labor costs. onclick="productdescpop(160130319)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">Aakaar Engineering is an emerging company based in Pune which provides solutions for Solid Waste Management with composting. "Established in the year 2018 at Chinchwad, Maharashtra. we “Aakaar Engineering” are a Sole Proprietorship based firm, engaged as the foremost Manufacturer, Exporter, Supplier and Service Provider of Garbage Chute System, Debris chutes, Waste Compost Machines, Organic Waste Composter, Industrial Fabrication, Linen chutes, Organic Waste Converter, etc. We partner with our customers and communities to manage and reduce waste from collection to disposal while recovering valuable resources and creating clean, renewable energy.
As Aakaar Engineering with our motive “Efficient Quality”, we actively uphold customer satisfaction as our ultimate target in our waste management. With our experience, infrastructure, specialized staff and the confidence inherited from our previous accomplishments; we are, proudly, the emerging company of our sector. more</span></div></div></div><div style="margin-top: 10px" class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(290213221)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_290213221" data-itemid="290213221" onclick="productdescpop(290213221)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">The Green Guru Organic Composting Machine is an innovative, fully automatic in-vessel composting machine designed to convert organic waste into nutrient-rich compost efficiently. Suitable for residential complexes, commercial kitchens, and industrial facilities, the Green Guru simplifies waste management while promoting eco-friendly practices. The machine’s advanced technology ensures fast and doorless composting, making it a perfect choice for sustainable waste management.
Key Features and Benefits Fully Automatic Operation:&nbsp;Minimal manual intervention required, making the composting process convenient and hassle-free.
In-Vessel Composting Technology:&nbsp;Uses a sealed chamber with heating and mixing systems for rapid and efficient composting.
Odor Control System:&nbsp;Advanced technology minimizes unpleasant odors, ensuring a clean and safe environment.
Energy-Efficient Design:&nbsp;Low power consumption with optimized performance for minimal environmental impact.
User-Friendly Interface:&nbsp;Digital  <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div id="desceditarea_290213221" data-itemid="290213221" more</span></div></div></div><div style="margin-top: 10px" class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(290212951)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_290212951" data-itemid="290212951" onclick="productdescpop(290212951)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">AAKAAR GREEN LLP proudly presents the Green Guru Composter, a fully automatic, in-vessel composting machine designed to convert organic waste into rich compost within 24 hours. Engineered for performance, ease of use, and durability, this machine is perfect for urban and commercial setups seeking a hygienic, odor-free, and sustainable waste management solution.
Product Overview
The Green Guru Composter is an advanced, fully automated system that processes food and organic waste into compost without manual intervention. Ideal for residential societies, hotels, restaurants, and industrial canteens, it supports decentralized waste treatment in a clean and efficient manner.Key Features Fully Automatic Operation: No manual mixing, turning, or curing required. Just load the waste and let the machine do the rest. In-Vessel Composting: Enclosed chamber prevents odor, pests, and external contamination. Built-in Heating System: Speeds up microbial activity and reduces composting time to just 24  <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div more</span></div></div></div><div style="margin-top: 10px" class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(160129630)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_160129630" data-itemid="160129630" onclick="productdescpop(160129630)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">AAKAAR GREEN LLP&nbsp;proudly presents the&nbsp;Green Guru Composter, a fully automatic, in-vessel composting machine designed to convert organic waste into rich compost within 24 hours. Engineered for performance, ease of use, and durability, this machine is perfect for urban and commercial setups seeking a hygienic, odor-free, and sustainable waste management solution.
Product Overview
The Green Guru Composter is an advanced, fully automated system that processes food and organic waste into compost without manual intervention. Ideal for residential societies, hotels, restaurants, and industrial canteens, it supports decentralized waste treatment in a clean and efficient manner.Key Features Fully Automatic Operation: No manual mixing, turning, or curing required. Just load the waste and let the machine do the rest. In-Vessel Composting: Enclosed chamber prevents odor, pests, and external contamination. Built-in Heating System: Speeds up microbial activity and reduces composting time to just&nbsp;24  <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div onclick="opencatPopup(151605078)" class="categediticon icon-sprite"></span><div class="chipsL1 SLC_dflx SLC_dflw SLC_tac"><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Waste Converter" onclick="opencatPopup(151605078);">Waste Converter</div><div class="addmorecat" onclick="opencatPopup(151605078)"><span class="addmoresign">+</span><span class="addmoretext">Add more</span></div></div></div><div style="margin-top: 10px" class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(151605078)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_151605078" data-itemid="151605078" onclick="productdescpop(151605078)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">AAKAAR GREEN LLP&nbsp;proudly presents the&nbsp;Green Guru Composter, a fully automatic, in-vessel composting machine designed to convert organic waste into rich compost within 24 hours. Engineered for performance, ease of use, and durability, this machine is perfect for urban and commercial setups seeking a hygienic, odor-free, and sustainable waste management solution.
Product Overview
The Green Guru Composter is an advanced, fully automated system that processes food and organic waste into compost without manual intervention. Ideal for residential societies, hotels, restaurants, and industrial canteens, it supports decentralized waste treatment in a clean and efficient manner.Key Features Fully Automatic Operation: No manual mixing, turning, or curing required. Just load the waste and let the machine do the rest. In-Vessel Composting: Enclosed chamber prevents odor, pests, and external contamination. Built-in Heating System: Speeds up microbial activity and reduces composting time to just&nbsp;24  <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div id="descidrbtn_290213443" data-itemid="290213443" onclick="productdescpop(290213443)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">The Green Guru Organic Composting Machine is an innovative, fully automatic in-vessel composting machine designed to convert organic waste into nutrient-rich compost efficiently. Suitable for residential complexes, commercial kitchens, and industrial facilities, the Green Guru simplifies waste management while promoting eco-friendly practices. The machine’s advanced technology ensures fast and doorless composting, making it a perfect choice for sustainable waste management.
Key Features and Benefits Fully Automatic Operation:&nbsp;Minimal manual intervention required, making the composting process convenient and hassle-free.
In-Vessel Composting Technology:&nbsp;Uses a sealed chamber with heating and mixing systems for rapid and efficient composting.
Odor Control System:&nbsp;Advanced technology minimizes unpleasant odors, ensuring a clean and safe environment.
Energy-Efficient Design:&nbsp;Low power consumption with optimized performance for minimal environmental impact.

class="SLC_dflx SLC_aic lis_catop"><h2 style="display:inline;margin-top: -3px;" onclick="opencatPopup(290213686);">Category</h2><span style="display:none;" title="Edit Category" onclick="opencatPopup(290213686)" class="categediticon icon-sprite"></span><div class="chipsL1 SLC_dflx SLC_dflw SLC_tac"><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Food Waste Composting Machine" onclick="opencatPopup(290213686);">Food Waste Composting Machine</div><div class="addmorecat" onclick="opencatPopup(290213686)"><span class="addmoresign">+</span><span class="addmoretext">Add more</span></div></div></div><div style="margin-top: 10px" class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(290213686)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_290213686" data-itemid="290213686" onclick="productdescpop(290213686)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">Product Description
The Green Guru Organic Composting Machine is an innovative, fully automatic in-vessel composting machine designed to convert organic waste into nutrient-rich compost efficiently. Suitable for residential complexes, commercial kitchens, and industrial facilities, the Green Guru simplifies waste management while promoting eco-friendly practices. The machine’s advanced technology ensures fast and doorless composting, making it a perfect choice for sustainable waste management.
Key Features and Benefits Fully Automatic Operation:&nbsp;Minimal manual intervention required, making the composting process convenient and hassle-free.
In-Vessel Composting Technology:&nbsp;Uses a sealed chamber with heating and mixing systems for rapid and efficient composting.
Odor Control System:&nbsp;Advanced technology minimizes unpleasant odors, ensuring a clean and safe environment.
Energy-Efficient Design:&nbsp;Low power consumption with optimized performance for minimal environmental impact.
User-Friendly <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div id="desceditarea_290213686" data-itemid="290213686" onclick="productdescpop(151604653)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">Aakaar Engineering is an emerging company based in Pune which provides solutions for Solid Waste Management with composting. "Established in the year 2018 at Chinchwad, Maharashtra. we “Aakaar Engineering” are a Sole Proprietorship based firm, engaged as the foremost Manufacturer, Exporter, Supplier and Service Provider of Garbage Chute System, Debris chutes, Waste Compost Machines, Organic Waste Composter, Industrial Fabrication, Linen chutes, Organic Waste Converter, etc. We partner with our customers and communities to manage and reduce waste from collection to disposal while recovering valuable resources and creating clean, renewable energy.
As Aakaar Engineering with our motive “Efficient Quality”, we actively uphold customer satisfaction as our ultimate target in our waste management. With our experience, infrastructure, specialized staff and the confidence inherited from our previous accomplishments; we are, proudly, the emerging company of our sector. lis_catop"><h2 style="display:inline;margin-top: -3px;" onclick="opencatPopup(160129713);">Category</h2><span style="display:none;" title="Edit Category" onclick="opencatPopup(160129713)" class="categediticon icon-sprite"></span><div class="chipsL1 SLC_dflx SLC_dflw SLC_tac"><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Food Waste Composting Machine" onclick="opencatPopup(160129713);">Food Waste Composting Machine</div><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Organic Waste Converter" onclick="opencatPopup(160129713);">Organic Waste Converter</div></div></div><div style="margin-top: 10px" class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(160129713)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_160129713" data-itemid="160129713" onclick="productdescpop(160129713)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">The Rotary Composter is a semi-automatic organic waste composting machine, also known as drum composting machine, specifically designed for large-scale composting. Suitable for industrial facilities, agricultural operations, large residential complexes, and commercial establishments, it processes large volumes of organic waste efficiently. With a composting cycle of 15 to 20 days, the Rotary Composter naturally converts organic material into high-quality compost without the need for a heating system. Its robust design requires more space for installation, making it ideal for facilities with ample room for waste management.
Key Features and Benefits Large-Scale Composting:&nbsp;Handles high volumes of organic waste, making it perfect for industrial or large residential applications.
In-Drum Composting Technology:&nbsp;Utilizes a rotating drum to aerate and mix the waste, promoting natural microbial decomposition.
No Heating System Required:&nbsp;Relies on natural microbial activity, reducing energy co <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div Composter</div></div></div><div style="margin-top: 10px" class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(160129714)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_160129714" data-itemid="160129714" onclick="productdescpop(160129714)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">AAKAAR GREEN LLP&nbsp;proudly presents the&nbsp;Green Guru Composter, a fully automatic, in-vessel composting machine designed to convert organic waste into rich compost within 24 hours. Engineered for performance, ease of use, and durability, this machine is perfect for urban and commercial setups seeking a hygienic, odor-free, and sustainable waste management solution.
Product Overview
The Green Guru Composter is an advanced, fully automated system that processes food and organic waste into compost without manual intervention. Ideal for residential societies, hotels, restaurants, and industrial canteens, it supports decentralized waste treatment in a clean and efficient manner.Key Features Fully Automatic Operation: No manual mixing, turning, or curing required. Just load the waste and let the machine do the rest. In-Vessel Composting: Enclosed chamber prevents odor, pests, and external contamination. Built-in Heating System: Speeds up microbial activity and reduces composting time to just&nbsp;24  <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div class="SLC_dflx SLC_aic lis_catop"><h2 style="display:inline;margin-top: -3px;" onclick="opencatPopup(151356260);">Category</h2><span style="display:none;" title="Edit Category" onclick="opencatPopup(151356260)" class="categediticon icon-sprite"></span><div class="chipsL1 SLC_dflx SLC_dflw SLC_tac"><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Organic Waste Composter" onclick="opencatPopup(151356260);">Organic Waste Composter</div><div class="addmorecat" onclick="opencatPopup(151356260)"><span class="addmoresign">+</span><span class="addmoretext">Add more</span></div></div></div><div style="margin-top: 10px" class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(151356260)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_151356260" data-itemid="151356260" onclick="productdescpop(151356260)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">
AAKAAR GREEN LLP presents the Rotary Drum Composter, a semi-automatic, in-drum composting system designed for efficient large-scale organic waste processing. Built with robust materials and advanced engineering, this composter offers an eco-friendly and cost-effective solution for converting organic waste into nutrient-rich compost.
Key Features: Semi-Automatic Operation: The machine operates with minimal manual intervention. Waste loading is manual, while drum rotation and aeration are automated. Horizontal Rotary Drum: The composter uses a horizontal drum mounted on a torsion wheel. It rotates slowly to ensure proper mixing and aeration of the waste. Ring Gear &amp; Gearbox System: Equipped with a heavy-duty ring gear and pinion connected to a gearbox for smooth and continuous rotation. Blower for Aeration: Fresh air is circulated inside the drum through an integrated blower system, maintaining aerobic conditions for fast composting. Sensor-Based Safety: A movement sensor detects misali <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div id="desceditarea_151356260" style="font-size:12px;display:inline; margin-left : 5px" id="grpselectmsg_151604453"></p></div></div><div class="product-mandate"><div class="mapped "><div style="gap: 7px" class="SLC_dflx SLC_aic lis_catop"><h2 style="display:inline;margin-top: -3px;" onclick="opencatPopup(151604453);">Category</h2><span style="display:none;" title="Edit Category" onclick="opencatPopup(151604453)" class="categediticon icon-sprite"></span><div class="chipsL1 SLC_dflx SLC_dflw SLC_tac"><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Food Waste Composting Machine" onclick="opencatPopup(151604453);">Food Waste Composting Machine</div><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Organic Waste Composter" onclick="opencatPopup(151604453);">Organic Waste Composter</div></div></div><div style="margin-top: 10px" class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(151604453)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_151604453" data-itemid="151604453" onclick="productdescpop(151604453)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">AAKAAR GREEN LLP presents the Rotary Drum Composter, a semi-automatic, in-drum composting system designed for efficient large-scale organic waste processing. Built with robust materials and advanced engineering, this composter offers an eco-friendly and cost-effective solution for converting organic waste into nutrient-rich compost.
Key Features: Semi-Automatic Operation: The machine operates with minimal manual intervention. Waste loading is manual, while drum rotation and aeration are automated. Horizontal Rotary Drum: The composter uses a horizontal drum mounted on a torsion wheel. It rotates slowly to ensure proper mixing and aeration of the waste. Ring Gear &amp; Gearbox System: Equipped with a heavy-duty ring gear and pinion connected to a gearbox for smooth and continuous rotation. Blower for Aeration: Fresh air is circulated inside the drum through an integrated blower system, maintaining aerobic conditions for fast composting. Sensor-Based Safety: A movement sensor detects misalig <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div id="desceditarea_151604453" class="categediticon icon-sprite"></span><div class="chipsL1 SLC_dflx SLC_dflw SLC_tac"><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Garbage Chutes" onclick="opencatPopup(151599548);">Garbage Chutes</div><div class="addmorecat" onclick="opencatPopup(151599548)"><span class="addmoresign">+</span><span class="addmoretext">Add more</span></div></div></div><div style="margin-top: 10px" class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(151599548)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_151599548" data-itemid="151599548" onclick="productdescpop(151599548)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">AAKAAR GREEN LLP&nbsp;offers high-quality&nbsp;Garbage Chute Systems&nbsp;designed to streamline waste collection in high-rise buildings, hotels, hospitals, and commercial complexes. Our chutes provide a centralized, safe, and odor-free method of waste disposal, ensuring a cleaner environment and improved sanitation.
What is a Garbage Chute?
A garbage chute is a vertical duct system installed in multistoried buildings, enabling residents or staff to dispose of waste directly from each floor. The chute carries the waste to a centralized collection area at the ground level or basement, minimizing manual handling and maintaining hygiene throughout the building.
Key Features Stainless Steel: Made from high-grade materials for strength, durability, and corrosion resistance. Flame Retardant &amp; Leak-Proof Design: Ensures safety and avoids leakage or contamination. Bottom-Hinged / Side-Hinged Inlets: Easy to operate and ergonomically designed for user convenience on every floor. Odor Control System: Optional  <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div id="desceditarea_151599548" data-itemid="151599548" lis_catop"><h2 style="display:inline;margin-top: -3px;" onclick="opencatPopup(160130331);">Category</h2><span style="display:none;" title="Edit Category" onclick="opencatPopup(160130331)" class="categediticon icon-sprite"></span><div class="chipsL1 SLC_dflx SLC_dflw SLC_tac"><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Garbage Chutes" onclick="opencatPopup(160130331);">Garbage Chutes</div><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Debris Chutes" onclick="opencatPopup(160130331);">Debris Chutes</div></div></div><div style="margin-top: 10px" class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(160130331)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_160130331" data-itemid="160130331" onclick="productdescpop(160130331)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">AAKAAR GREEN LLP&nbsp;offers high-quality&nbsp;Garbage Chute Systems&nbsp;designed to streamline waste collection in high-rise buildings, hotels, hospitals, and commercial complexes. Our chutes provide a centralized, safe, and odor-free method of waste disposal, ensuring a cleaner environment and improved sanitation.
What is a Garbage Chute?
A garbage chute is a vertical duct system installed in multistoried buildings, enabling residents or staff to dispose of waste directly from each floor. The chute carries the waste to a centralized collection area at the ground level or basement, minimizing manual handling and maintaining hygiene throughout the building.
Key Features Stainless Steel: Made from high-grade materials for strength, durability, and corrosion resistance. Flame Retardant &amp; Leak-Proof Design: Ensures safety and avoids leakage or contamination. Bottom-Hinged / Side-Hinged Inlets: Easy to operate and ergonomically designed for user convenience on every floor. Odor Control System: Optional  <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div id="desceditarea_160130331" data-itemid="160130331" class="categediticon icon-sprite"></span><div class="chipsL1 SLC_dflx SLC_dflw SLC_tac"><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Garbage Chutes" onclick="opencatPopup(160130315);">Garbage Chutes</div><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Debris Chutes" onclick="opencatPopup(160130315);">Debris Chutes</div><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Steel Chutes" onclick="opencatPopup(160130315);">Steel Chutes</div></div></div><div style="margin-top: 10px" class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(160130315)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_160130315" data-itemid="160130315" onclick="productdescpop(160130315)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">AAKAAR GREEN LLP&nbsp;offers high-quality&nbsp;Garbage Chute Systems&nbsp;designed to streamline waste collection in high-rise buildings, hotels, hospitals, and commercial complexes. Our chutes provide a centralized, safe, and odor-free method of waste disposal, ensuring a cleaner environment and improved sanitation.
What is a Garbage Chute?
A garbage chute is a vertical duct system installed in multistoried buildings, enabling residents or staff to dispose of waste directly from each floor. The chute carries the waste to a centralized collection area at the ground level or basement, minimizing manual handling and maintaining hygiene throughout the building.
Key Features Stainless Steel: Made from high-grade materials for strength, durability, and corrosion resistance. Flame Retardant &amp; Leak-Proof Design: Ensures safety and avoids leakage or contamination. Bottom-Hinged / Side-Hinged Inlets: Easy to operate and ergonomically designed for user convenience on every floor. Odor Control System: Optional  <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div id="desceditarea_160130315" data-itemid="160130315" class="categediticon icon-sprite"></span><div class="chipsL1 SLC_dflx SLC_dflw SLC_tac"><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Garbage Chutes" onclick="opencatPopup(151599889);">Garbage Chutes</div><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Steel Chutes" onclick="opencatPopup(151599889);">Steel Chutes</div></div></div><div style="margin-top: 10px" class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(151599889)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_151599889" data-itemid="151599889" onclick="productdescpop(151599889)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">AAKAAR GREEN LLP&nbsp;offers high-quality&nbsp;Garbage Chute Systems&nbsp;designed to streamline waste collection in high-rise buildings, hotels, hospitals, and commercial complexes. Our chutes provide a centralized, safe, and odor-free method of waste disposal, ensuring a cleaner environment and improved sanitation.
What is a Garbage Chute?
A garbage chute is a vertical duct system installed in multistoried buildings, enabling residents or staff to dispose of waste directly from each floor. The chute carries the waste to a centralized collection area at the ground level or basement, minimizing manual handling and maintaining hygiene throughout the building.
Key Features Stainless Steel: Made from high-grade materials for strength, durability, and corrosion resistance. Flame Retardant &amp; Leak-Proof Design: Ensures safety and avoids leakage or contamination. Bottom-Hinged / Side-Hinged Inlets: Easy to operate and ergonomically designed for user convenience on every floor. Odor Control System: Optional  <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div id="desceditarea_151599889" data-itemid="151599889" class="categediticon icon-sprite"></span><div class="chipsL1 SLC_dflx SLC_dflw SLC_tac"><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Garbage Chutes" onclick="opencatPopup(151599386);">Garbage Chutes</div><div class="addmorecat" onclick="opencatPopup(151599386)"><span class="addmoresign">+</span><span class="addmoretext">Add more</span></div></div></div><div style="margin-top: 10px" class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(151599386)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_151599386" data-itemid="151599386" onclick="productdescpop(151599386)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">AAKAAR GREEN LLP&nbsp;offers high-quality&nbsp;Garbage Chute Systems&nbsp;designed to streamline waste collection in high-rise buildings, hotels, hospitals, and commercial complexes. Our chutes provide a centralized, safe, and odor-free method of waste disposal, ensuring a cleaner environment and improved sanitation.
What is a Garbage Chute?
A garbage chute is a vertical duct system installed in multistoried buildings, enabling residents or staff to dispose of waste directly from each floor. The chute carries the waste to a centralized collection area at the ground level or basement, minimizing manual handling and maintaining hygiene throughout the building.
Key Features Stainless Steel: Made from high-grade materials for strength, durability, and corrosion resistance. Flame Retardant &amp; Leak-Proof Design: Ensures safety and avoids leakage or contamination. Bottom-Hinged / Side-Hinged Inlets: Easy to operate and ergonomically designed for user convenience on every floor. Odor Control System: Optional  <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div id="desceditarea_151599386" data-itemid="151599386" Converter</div></div></div><div style="margin-top: 10px" class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(290213904)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_290213904" data-itemid="290213904" onclick="productdescpop(290213904)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">AAKAAR GREEN LLP&nbsp;proudly presents the&nbsp;Green Guru Composter, a fully automatic, in-vessel composting machine designed to convert organic waste into rich compost within 24 hours. Engineered for performance, ease of use, and durability, this machine is perfect for urban and commercial setups seeking a hygienic, odor-free, and sustainable waste management solution.
Product Overview
The Green Guru Composter is an advanced, fully automated system that processes food and organic waste into compost without manual intervention. Ideal for residential societies, hotels, restaurants, and industrial canteens, it supports decentralized waste treatment in a clean and efficient manner.Key Features Fully Automatic Operation: No manual mixing, turning, or curing required. Just load the waste and let the machine do the rest. In-Vessel Composting: Enclosed chamber prevents odor, pests, and external contamination. Built-in Heating System: Speeds up microbial activity and reduces composting time to just&nbsp;24  <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div more</span></div></div></div><div style="margin-top: 10px" class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(290214038)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_290214038" data-itemid="290214038" onclick="productdescpop(290214038)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">AAKAAR GREEN LLP&nbsp;proudly presents the&nbsp;Green Guru Composter, a fully automatic, in-vessel composting machine designed to convert organic waste into rich compost within 24 hours. Engineered for performance, ease of use, and durability, this machine is perfect for urban and commercial setups seeking a hygienic, odor-free, and sustainable waste management solution.
Product Overview
The Green Guru Composter is an advanced, fully automated system that processes food and organic waste into compost without manual intervention. Ideal for residential societies, hotels, restaurants, and industrial canteens, it supports decentralized waste treatment in a clean and efficient manner.Key Features Fully Automatic Operation: No manual mixing, turning, or curing required. Just load the waste and let the machine do the rest. In-Vessel Composting: Enclosed chamber prevents odor, pests, and external contamination. Built-in Heating System: Speeds up microbial activity and reduces composting time to just&nbsp;24  <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(151604718)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_151604718" data-itemid="151604718" onclick="productdescpop(151604718)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">AAKAAR GREEN LLP&nbsp;proudly presents the&nbsp;Green Guru Composter, a fully automatic, in-vessel composting machine designed to convert organic waste into rich compost within 24 hours. Engineered for performance, ease of use, and durability, this machine is perfect for urban and commercial setups seeking a hygienic, odor-free, and sustainable waste management solution.
Product Overview
The Green Guru Composter is an advanced, fully automated system that processes food and organic waste into compost without manual intervention. Ideal for residential societies, hotels, restaurants, and industrial canteens, it supports decentralized waste treatment in a clean and efficient manner.Key Features Fully Automatic Operation: No manual mixing, turning, or curing required. Just load the waste and let the machine do the rest. In-Vessel Composting: Enclosed chamber prevents odor, pests, and external contamination. Built-in Heating System: Speeds up microbial activity and reduces composting time to just&nbsp;24  <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div 10px" class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(271970748)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_271970748" data-itemid="271970748" onclick="productdescpop(271970748)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">AAKAAR GREEN LLP&nbsp;proudly presents the&nbsp;Green Guru Composter, a fully automatic, in-vessel composting machine designed to convert organic waste into rich compost within 24 hours. Engineered for performance, ease of use, and durability, this machine is perfect for urban and commercial setups seeking a hygienic, odor-free, and sustainable waste management solution.
Product Overview
The Green Guru Composter is an advanced, fully automated system that processes food and organic waste into compost without manual intervention. Ideal for residential societies, hotels, restaurants, and industrial canteens, it supports decentralized waste treatment in a clean and efficient manner.Key Features Fully Automatic Operation: No manual mixing, turning, or curing required. Just load the waste and let the machine do the rest. In-Vessel Composting: Enclosed chamber prevents odor, pests, and external contamination. Built-in Heating System: Speeds up microbial activity and reduces composting time to just&nbsp;24  <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(271936759)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_271936759" data-itemid="271936759" onclick="productdescpop(271936759)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">AAKAAR GREEN LLP&nbsp;proudly presents the&nbsp;Green Guru Composter, a fully automatic, in-vessel composting machine designed to convert organic waste into rich compost within 24 hours. Engineered for performance, ease of use, and durability, this machine is perfect for urban and commercial setups seeking a hygienic, odor-free, and sustainable waste management solution.
Product Overview
The Green Guru Composter is an advanced, fully automated system that processes food and organic waste into compost without manual intervention. Ideal for residential societies, hotels, restaurants, and industrial canteens, it supports decentralized waste treatment in a clean and efficient manner.Key Features Fully Automatic Operation: No manual mixing, turning, or curing required. Just load the waste and let the machine do the rest. In-Vessel Composting: Enclosed chamber prevents odor, pests, and external contamination. Built-in Heating System: Speeds up microbial activity and reduces composting time to just&nbsp;24  <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div lis_catop"><h2 style="display:inline;margin-top: -3px;" onclick="opencatPopup(160129291);">Category</h2><span style="display:none;" title="Edit Category" onclick="opencatPopup(160129291)" class="categediticon icon-sprite"></span><div class="chipsL1 SLC_dflx SLC_dflw SLC_tac"><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Food Waste Composting Machine" onclick="opencatPopup(160129291);">Food Waste Composting Machine</div><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Compost Equipment" onclick="opencatPopup(160129291);">Compost Equipment</div><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Organic Waste Converter" onclick="opencatPopup(160129291);">Organic Waste Converter</div></div></div><div style="margin-top: 10px" class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(160129291)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_160129291" data-itemid="160129291" onclick="productdescpop(160129291)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">
AAKAAR GREEN LLP presents the Rotary Drum Composter, a semi-automatic, in-drum composting system designed for efficient large-scale organic waste processing. Built with robust materials and advanced engineering, this composter offers an eco-friendly and cost-effective solution for converting organic waste into nutrient-rich compost.
Key Features: Semi-Automatic Operation: The machine operates with minimal manual intervention. Waste loading is manual, while drum rotation and aeration are automated. Horizontal Rotary Drum: The composter uses a horizontal drum mounted on a torsion wheel. It rotates slowly to ensure proper mixing and aeration of the waste. Ring Gear &amp; Gearbox System: Equipped with a heavy-duty ring gear and pinion connected to a gearbox for smooth and continuous rotation. Blower for Aeration: Fresh air is circulated inside the drum through an integrated blower system, maintaining aerobic conditions for fast composting. Sensor-Based Safety: A movement sensor detects misali <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div id="desceditarea_160129291"
