style="font-size:12px;display:inline; margin-left : 5px" id="grpselectmsg_160129266"></p></div></div><div class="product-mandate"><div class="mapped "><div style="gap: 7px" class="SLC_dflx SLC_aic lis_catop"><h2 style="display:inline;margin-top: -3px;" onclick="opencatPopup(160129266);">Category</h2><span style="display:none;" title="Edit Category" onclick="opencatPopup(160129266)" class="categediticon icon-sprite"></span><div class="chipsL1 SLC_dflx SLC_dflw SLC_tac"><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Compost Equipment" onclick="opencatPopup(160129266);">Compost Equipment</div><div class="addmorecat" onclick="opencatPopup(160129266)"><span class="addmoresign">+</span><span class="addmoretext">Add more</span></div></div></div><div style="margin-top: 10px" class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(160129266)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_160129266" data-itemid="160129266" onclick="productdescpop(160129266)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">AAKAAR GREEN LLP presents the Rotary Drum Composter, a semi-automatic, in-drum composting system designed for efficient large-scale organic waste processing. Built with robust materials and advanced engineering, this composter offers an eco-friendly and cost-effective solution for converting organic waste into nutrient-rich compost.
Key Features: Semi-Automatic Operation: The machine operates with minimal manual intervention. Waste loading is manual, while drum rotation and aeration are automated. Horizontal Rotary Drum: The composter uses a horizontal drum mounted on a torsion wheel. It rotates slowly to ensure proper mixing and aeration of the waste. Ring Gear &amp; Gearbox System: Equipped with a heavy-duty ring gear and pinion connected to a gearbox for smooth and continuous rotation. Blower for Aeration: Fresh air is circulated inside the drum through an integrated blower system, maintaining aerobic conditions for fast composting. Sensor-Based Safety: A movement sensor detects misalig <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div id="desceditarea_160129266" class="categediticon icon-sprite"></span><div class="chipsL1 SLC_dflx SLC_dflw SLC_tac"><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Garbage Chutes" onclick="opencatPopup(151599317);">Garbage class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(151599317)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_151599317" data-itemid="151599317" onclick="productdescpop(151599317)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">AAKAAR GREEN LLP offers high-quality Garbage Chute Systems designed to streamline waste collection in high-rise buildings, hotels, hospitals, and commercial complexes. Our chutes provide a centralized, safe, and odor-free method of waste disposal, ensuring a cleaner environment and improved sanitation.
What is a Garbage Chute?
A garbage chute is a vertical duct system installed in multistoried buildings, enabling residents or staff to dispose of waste directly from each floor. The chute carries the waste to a centralized collection area at the ground level or basement, minimizing manual handling and maintaining hygiene throughout the building.
Key Features: Stainless Steel / Galvanized Iron Construction: Made from high-grade materials for strength, durability, and corrosion resistance. Flame Retardant &amp; Leak-Proof Design: Ensures safety and avoids leakage or contamination. Bottom-Hinged / Side-Hinged Inlets: Easy to operate and ergonomically designed for user convenience on every floor <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div id="desceditarea_151599317" data-itemid="151599317" class="dropdescPop"></div></div></div> <div class="specific" id="specificationDiv151599317"><h2 class="categediticon icon-sprite"></span><div class="chipsL1 SLC_dflx SLC_dflw SLC_tac"><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Steel Chutes" onclick="opencatPopup(151599752);">Steel Chutes</div><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Garbage Chutes" onclick="opencatPopup(151599752);">Garbage Chutes</div></div></div><div style="margin-top: 10px" class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(151599752)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_151599752" data-itemid="151599752" onclick="productdescpop(151599752)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover"> AAKAAR GREEN LLP offers high-quality Garbage Chute Systems designed to streamline waste collection in high-rise buildings, hotels, hospitals, and commercial complexes. Our chutes provide a centralized, safe, and odor-free method of waste disposal, ensuring a cleaner environment and improved sanitation
What is a Garbage Chute?
A garbage chute is a vertical duct system installed in multistoried buildings, enabling residents or staff to dispose of waste directly from each floor. The chute carries the waste to a centralized collection area at the ground level or basement, minimizing manual handling and maintaining hygiene throughout the building.
Key Features: Stainless Steel: Made from high-grade materials for strength, durability, and corrosion resistance. Flame Retardant &amp; Leak-Proof Design: Ensures safety and avoids leakage or contamination. Bottom-Hinged / Side-Hinged Inlets: Easy to operate and ergonomically designed for user convenience on every floor. Odor Control System: Optional <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div id="desceditarea_151599752" data-itemid="151599752" style="font-size:12px;display:inline; margin-left : 5px" id="grpselectmsg_160129293"></p></div></div><div class="product-mandate"><div class="mapped "><div style="gap: 7px" class="SLC_dflx SLC_aic lis_catop"><h2 style="display:inline;margin-top: -3px;" onclick="opencatPopup(160129293);">Category</h2><span style="display:none;" title="Edit Category" onclick="opencatPopup(160129293)" class="categediticon icon-sprite"></span><div class="chipsL1 SLC_dflx SLC_dflw SLC_tac"><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Food Waste Composting Machine" onclick="opencatPopup(160129293);">Food Waste Composting Machine</div><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Organic Waste Converter" onclick="opencatPopup(160129293);">Organic Waste Converter</div></div></div><div style="margin-top: 10px" class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(160129293)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_160129293" data-itemid="160129293" onclick="productdescpop(160129293)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">The Rotary Composter is a semi-automatic organic waste composting machine, also known as drum composting machine, specifically designed for large-scale composting. Suitable for industrial facilities, agricultural operations, large residential complexes, and commercial establishments, it processes large volumes of organic waste efficiently. With a composting cycle of 15 to 20 days, the Rotary Composter naturally converts organic material into high-quality compost without the need for a heating system. Its robust design requires more space for installation, making it ideal for facilities with ample room for waste management.
Key Features and Benefits Large-Scale Composting:&nbsp;Handles high volumes of organic waste, making it perfect for industrial or large residential applications.
In-Drum Composting Technology:&nbsp;Utilizes a rotating drum to aerate and mix the waste, promoting natural microbial decomposition.
No Heating System Required:&nbsp;Relies on natural microbial activity, reducing energy co <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div class="categediticon icon-sprite"></span><div class="chipsL1 SLC_dflx SLC_dflw SLC_tac"><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Organic Waste Composter" onclick="opencatPopup(160129715);">Organic Waste Composter</div><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Food Waste Composting Machine" onclick="opencatPopup(160129715);">Food Waste Composting Machine</div></div></div><div style="margin-top: 10px" class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(160129715)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_160129715" data-itemid="160129715" onclick="productdescpop(160129715)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">The Rotary Composter is a semi-automatic organic waste composting machine, also known as drum composting machine, specifically designed for large-scale composting. Suitable for industrial facilities, agricultural operations, large residential complexes, and commercial establishments, it processes large volumes of organic waste efficiently. With a composting cycle of 15 to 20 days, the Rotary Composter naturally converts organic material into high-quality compost without the need for a heating system. Its robust design requires more space for installation, making it ideal for facilities with ample room for waste management.
Key Features and Benefits Large-Scale Composting:&nbsp;Handles high volumes of organic waste, making it perfect for industrial or large residential applications.
In-Drum Composting Technology:&nbsp;Utilizes a rotating drum to aerate and mix the waste, promoting natural microbial decomposition.
No Heating System Required:&nbsp;Relies on natural microbial activity, reducing energy co <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div onclick="opencatPopup(160129627)" class="categediticon icon-sprite"></span><div class="chipsL1 SLC_dflx SLC_dflw SLC_tac"><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Organic Waste Converter" onclick="opencatPopup(160129627);">Organic Waste Converter</div><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Food Waste Composting Machine" onclick="opencatPopup(160129627);">Food Waste Composting Machine</div></div></div><div style="margin-top: 10px" class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(160129627)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_160129627" data-itemid="160129627" onclick="productdescpop(160129627)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">The Rotary Composter is a semi-automatic organic waste composting machine, also known as drum composting machine, specifically designed for large-scale composting. Suitable for industrial facilities, agricultural operations, large residential complexes, and commercial establishments, it processes large volumes of organic waste efficiently. With a composting cycle of 15 to 20 days, the Rotary Composter naturally converts organic material into high-quality compost without the need for a heating system. Its robust design requires more space for installation, making it ideal for facilities with ample room for waste management.
Key Features and Benefits Large-Scale Composting:&nbsp;Handles high volumes of organic waste, making it perfect for industrial or large residential applications.
In-Drum Composting Technology:&nbsp;Utilizes a rotating drum to aerate and mix the waste, promoting natural microbial decomposition.
No Heating System Required:&nbsp;Relies on natural microbial activity, reducing energy co <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div Converter</div></div></div><div style="margin-top: 10px" class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(160129711)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_160129711" data-itemid="160129711" onclick="productdescpop(160129711)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">The Rotary Composter is a semi-automatic organic waste composting machine, also known as drum composting machine, specifically designed for large-scale composting. Suitable for industrial facilities, agricultural operations, large residential complexes, and commercial establishments, it processes large volumes of organic waste efficiently. With a composting cycle of 15 to 20 days, the Rotary Composter naturally converts organic material into high-quality compost without the need for a heating system. Its robust design requires more space for installation, making it ideal for facilities with ample room for waste management.
Key Features and Benefits Large-Scale Composting:&nbsp;Handles high volumes of organic waste, making it perfect for industrial or large residential applications.
In-Drum Composting Technology:&nbsp;Utilizes a rotating drum to aerate and mix the waste, promoting natural microbial decomposition.
No Heating System Required:&nbsp;Relies on natural microbial activity, reducing energy co <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div onclick="opencatPopup(160129622);">Food Waste Composting Machine</div><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Organic Waste Converter" onclick="opencatPopup(160129622);">Organic Waste Converter</div></div></div><div style="margin-top: 10px" class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(160129622)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_160129622" data-itemid="160129622" onclick="productdescpop(160129622)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">The Rotary Composter is a semi-automatic organic waste composting machine, also known as drum composting machine, specifically designed for large-scale composting. Suitable for industrial facilities, agricultural operations, large residential complexes, and commercial establishments, it processes large volumes of organic waste efficiently. With a composting cycle of 15 to 20 days, the Rotary Composter naturally converts organic material into high-quality compost without the need for a heating system. Its robust design requires more space for installation, making it ideal for facilities with ample room for waste management.
Key Features and Benefits Large-Scale Composting:&nbsp;Handles high volumes of organic waste, making it perfect for industrial or large residential applications.
In-Drum Composting Technology:&nbsp;Utilizes a rotating drum to aerate and mix the waste, promoting natural microbial decomposition.
No Heating System Required:&nbsp;Relies on natural microbial activity, reducing energy co <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div class="SLC_dflx SLC_aic lis_catop"><h2 style="display:inline;margin-top: -3px;" onclick="opencatPopup(160129623);">Category</h2><span style="display:none;" title="Edit Category" onclick="opencatPopup(160129623)" class="categediticon icon-sprite"></span><div class="chipsL1 SLC_dflx SLC_dflw SLC_tac"><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Food Waste Composting Machine" onclick="opencatPopup(160129623);">Food Waste Composting Machine</div><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Organic Waste Converter" onclick="opencatPopup(160129623);">Organic Waste Converter</div></div></div><div style="margin-top: 10px" class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(160129623)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_160129623" data-itemid="160129623" onclick="productdescpop(160129623)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">The Rotary Composter is a semi-automatic organic waste composting machine, also known as drum composting machine, specifically designed for large-scale composting. Suitable for industrial facilities, agricultural operations, large residential complexes, and commercial establishments, it processes large volumes of organic waste efficiently. With a composting cycle of 15 to 20 days, the Rotary Composter naturally converts organic material into high-quality compost without the need for a heating system. Its robust design requires more space for installation, making it ideal for facilities with ample room for waste management.
Key Features and Benefits Large-Scale Composting:&nbsp;Handles high volumes of organic waste, making it perfect for industrial or large residential applications.
In-Drum Composting Technology:&nbsp;Utilizes a rotating drum to aerate and mix the waste, promoting natural microbial decomposition.
No Heating System Required:&nbsp;Relies on natural microbial activity, reducing energy co <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div onclick="opencatPopup(160129628)" class="categediticon icon-sprite"></span><div class="chipsL1 SLC_dflx SLC_dflw SLC_tac"><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Food Waste Composting Machine" onclick="opencatPopup(160129628);">Food Waste Composting Machine</div><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Organic Waste Converter" onclick="opencatPopup(160129628);">Organic Waste Converter</div></div></div><div style="margin-top: 10px" class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(160129628)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_160129628" data-itemid="160129628" onclick="productdescpop(160129628)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">The Rotary Composter is a semi-automatic organic waste composting machine, also known as drum composting machine, specifically designed for large-scale composting. Suitable for industrial facilities, agricultural operations, large residential complexes, and commercial establishments, it processes large volumes of organic waste efficiently. With a composting cycle of 15 to 20 days, the Rotary Composter naturally converts organic material into high-quality compost without the need for a heating system. Its robust design requires more space for installation, making it ideal for facilities with ample room for waste management.
Key Features and Benefits Large-Scale Composting:&nbsp;Handles high volumes of organic waste, making it perfect for industrial or large residential applications.
In-Drum Composting Technology:&nbsp;Utilizes a rotating drum to aerate and mix the waste, promoting natural microbial decomposition.
No Heating System Required:&nbsp;Relies on natural microbial activity, reducing energy co <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div onclick="opencatPopup(160129624)" class="categediticon icon-sprite"></span><div class="chipsL1 SLC_dflx SLC_dflw SLC_tac"><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Food Waste Composting Machine" onclick="opencatPopup(160129624);">Food Waste Composting Machine</div><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Organic Waste Converter" onclick="opencatPopup(160129624);">Organic Waste Converter</div></div></div><div style="margin-top: 10px" class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(160129624)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_160129624" data-itemid="160129624" onclick="productdescpop(160129624)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">The Rotary Composter is a semi-automatic organic waste composting machine, also known as drum composting machine, specifically designed for large-scale composting. Suitable for industrial facilities, agricultural operations, large residential complexes, and commercial establishments, it processes large volumes of organic waste efficiently. With a composting cycle of 15 to 20 days, the Rotary Composter naturally converts organic material into high-quality compost without the need for a heating system. Its robust design requires more space for installation, making it ideal for facilities with ample room for waste management.
Key Features and Benefits Large-Scale Composting:&nbsp;Handles high volumes of organic waste, making it perfect for industrial or large residential applications.
In-Drum Composting Technology:&nbsp;Utilizes a rotating drum to aerate and mix the waste, promoting natural microbial decomposition.
No Heating System Required:&nbsp;Relies on natural microbial activity, reducing energy co <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div class="SLC_dflx SLC_aic lis_catop"><h2 style="display:inline;margin-top: -3px;" onclick="opencatPopup(160129626);">Category</h2><span style="display:none;" title="Edit Category" onclick="opencatPopup(160129626)" class="categediticon icon-sprite"></span><div class="chipsL1 SLC_dflx SLC_dflw SLC_tac"><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Food Waste Composting Machine" onclick="opencatPopup(160129626);">Food Waste Composting Machine</div><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Organic Waste Converter" onclick="opencatPopup(160129626);">Organic Waste Converter</div></div></div><div style="margin-top: 10px" class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(160129626)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_160129626" data-itemid="160129626" onclick="productdescpop(160129626)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">The Rotary Composter is a semi-automatic organic waste composting machine, also known as drum composting machine, specifically designed for large-scale composting. Suitable for industrial facilities, agricultural operations, large residential complexes, and commercial establishments, it processes large volumes of organic waste efficiently. With a composting cycle of 15 to 20 days, the Rotary Composter naturally converts organic material into high-quality compost without the need for a heating system. Its robust design requires more space for installation, making it ideal for facilities with ample room for waste management.
Key Features and Benefits Large-Scale Composting:&nbsp;Handles high volumes of organic waste, making it perfect for industrial or large residential applications.
In-Drum Composting Technology:&nbsp;Utilizes a rotating drum to aerate and mix the waste, promoting natural microbial decomposition.
No Heating System Required:&nbsp;Relies on natural microbial activity, reducing energy co <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div Pune which provides solutions for Solid Waste Management with composting. "Established in the year 2018 at Chinchwad, Maharashtra. we “Aakaar Engineering” are a Sole Proprietorship based firm, engaged as the foremost Manufacturer, Exporter, Supplier and Service Provider of Garbage Chute System, Debris chutes, Waste Compost Machines, Organic Waste Composter, Industrial Fabrication, Linen chutes, Organic Waste Converter, etc. We partner with our customers and communities to manage and reduce waste from collection to disposal while recovering valuable resources and creating clean, renewable energy.
As Aakaar Engineering with our motive “Efficient Quality”, we actively uphold customer satisfaction as our ultimate target in our waste management. With our experience, infrastructure, specialized staff and the confidence inherited from our previous accomplishments; we are, proudly, the emerging company of our sector. class="SLC_dflx SLC_aic lis_catop"><h2 style="display:inline;margin-top: -3px;" onclick="opencatPopup(253019204);">Category</h2><span style="display:none;" title="Edit Category" onclick="opencatPopup(253019204)" class="categediticon icon-sprite"></span><div class="chipsL1 SLC_dflx SLC_dflw SLC_tac"><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Food Waste Composting Machine" onclick="opencatPopup(253019204);">Food Waste Composting Machine</div><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Organic Waste Converter" onclick="opencatPopup(253019204);">Organic Waste Converter</div></div></div><div style="margin-top: 10px" class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(253019204)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_253019204" data-itemid="253019204" onclick="productdescpop(253019204)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">The Rotary Composter is a semi-automatic organic waste composting machine, also known as drum composting machine, specifically designed for large-scale composting. Suitable for industrial facilities, agricultural operations, large residential complexes, and commercial establishments, it processes large volumes of organic waste efficiently. With a composting cycle of 15 to 20 days, the Rotary Composter naturally converts organic material into high-quality compost without the need for a heating system. Its robust design requires more space for installation, making it ideal for facilities with ample room for waste management.
Key Features and Benefits Large-Scale Composting:&nbsp;Handles high volumes of organic waste, making it perfect for industrial or large residential applications.
In-Drum Composting Technology:&nbsp;Utilizes a rotating drum to aerate and mix the waste, promoting natural microbial decomposition.
No Heating System Required:&nbsp;Relies on natural microbial activity, reducing energy co <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div onclick="opencatPopup(160129625)" class="categediticon icon-sprite"></span><div class="chipsL1 SLC_dflx SLC_dflw SLC_tac"><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Food Waste Composting Machine" onclick="opencatPopup(160129625);">Food Waste Composting Machine</div><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Organic Waste Converter" onclick="opencatPopup(160129625);">Organic Waste Converter</div></div></div><div style="margin-top: 10px" class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(160129625)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_160129625" data-itemid="160129625" onclick="productdescpop(160129625)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">The Rotary Composter is a semi-automatic organic waste composting machine, also known as drum composting machine, specifically designed for large-scale composting. Suitable for industrial facilities, agricultural operations, large residential complexes, and commercial establishments, it processes large volumes of organic waste efficiently. With a composting cycle of 15 to 20 days, the Rotary Composter naturally converts organic material into high-quality compost without the need for a heating system. Its robust design requires more space for installation, making it ideal for facilities with ample room for waste management.
Key Features and Benefits Large-Scale Composting:&nbsp;Handles high volumes of organic waste, making it perfect for industrial or large residential applications.
In-Drum Composting Technology:&nbsp;Utilizes a rotating drum to aerate and mix the waste, promoting natural microbial decomposition.
No Heating System Required:&nbsp;Relies on natural microbial activity, reducing energy co <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div onclick="opencatPopup(160129710)" class="categediticon icon-sprite"></span><div class="chipsL1 SLC_dflx SLC_dflw SLC_tac"><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Food Waste Composting Machine" onclick="opencatPopup(160129710);">Food Waste Composting Machine</div><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Organic Waste Converter" onclick="opencatPopup(160129710);">Organic Waste Converter</div></div></div><div style="margin-top: 10px" class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(160129710)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_160129710" data-itemid="160129710" onclick="productdescpop(160129710)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">The Rotary Composter is a semi-automatic organic waste composting machine, also known as drum composting machine, specifically designed for large-scale composting. Suitable for industrial facilities, agricultural operations, large residential complexes, and commercial establishments, it processes large volumes of organic waste efficiently. With a composting cycle of 15 to 20 days, the Rotary Composter naturally converts organic material into high-quality compost without the need for a heating system. Its robust design requires more space for installation, making it ideal for facilities with ample room for waste management.
Key Features and Benefits Large-Scale Composting:&nbsp;Handles high volumes of organic waste, making it perfect for industrial or large residential applications.
In-Drum Composting Technology:&nbsp;Utilizes a rotating drum to aerate and mix the waste, promoting natural microbial decomposition.
No Heating System Required:&nbsp;Relies on natural microbial activity, reducing energy co <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div class="SLC_dflx SLC_aic lis_catop"><h2 style="display:inline;margin-top: -3px;" onclick="opencatPopup(290213555);">Category</h2><span style="display:none;" title="Edit Category" onclick="opencatPopup(290213555)" class="categediticon icon-sprite"></span><div class="chipsL1 SLC_dflx SLC_dflw SLC_tac"><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Food Waste Composting Machine" onclick="opencatPopup(290213555);">Food Waste Composting Machine</div><div class="chip1 SLC_f13 SLC_cp SLC_c0" title="Organic Waste Converter" onclick="opencatPopup(290213555);">Organic Waste Converter</div></div></div><div style="margin-top: 10px" class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(290213555)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_290213555" data-itemid="290213555" onclick="productdescpop(290213555)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">Product Description
The Green Guru Organic Composting Machine is an innovative, fully automatic in-vessel composting machine designed to convert organic waste into nutrient-rich compost efficiently. Suitable for residential complexes, commercial kitchens, and industrial facilities, the Green Guru simplifies waste management while promoting eco-friendly practices. The machine’s advanced technology ensures fast and doorless composting, making it a perfect choice for sustainable waste management.
Key Features and Benefits Fully Automatic Operation:&nbsp;Minimal manual intervention required, making the composting process convenient and hassle-free.
In-Vessel Composting Technology:&nbsp;Uses a sealed chamber with heating and mixing systems for rapid and efficient composting.
Odor Control System:&nbsp;Advanced technology minimizes unpleasant odors, ensuring a clean and safe environment.
Energy-Efficient Design:&nbsp;Low power consumption with optimized performance for minimal environmental impact.
User-Friendly <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div id="desceditarea_290213555" data-itemid="290213555" filledDescHover">Aakaar Engineering is an emerging company based in Pune which provides solutions for Solid Waste Management with composting. "Established in the year 2018 at Chinchwad, Maharashtra. we “Aakaar Engineering” are a Sole Proprietorship based firm, engaged as the foremost Manufacturer, Exporter, Supplier and Service Provider of Garbage Chute System, Debris chutes, Waste Compost Machines, Organic Waste Composter, Industrial Fabrication, Linen chutes, Organic Waste Converter, etc. We partner with our customers and communities to manage and reduce waste from collection to disposal while recovering valuable resources and creating clean, renewable energy.
As Aakaar Engineering with our motive “Efficient Quality”, we actively uphold customer satisfaction as our ultimate target in our waste management. With our experience, infrastructure, specialized staff and the confidence inherited from our previous accomplishments; we are, proudly, the emerging company of our sector. class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">Introducing Aakaar Industries' Garbage Chutes: the efficient and hygienic solution for waste disposal in high-rise buildings and commercial complexes. Our garbage chutes are meticulously engineered to streamline waste management processes, offering convenience, cleanliness, and safety for residents and building occupants.
Designed for durability and reliability, our garbage chutes are constructed from high-quality materials, ensuring long-lasting performance even in the busiest environments. Whether it's residential apartments, office buildings, or hotels, our chutes can handle the daily disposal needs with ease.
Installation of our garbage chutes is hassle-free, thanks to our expert team of technicians who ensure seamless integration into your building's infrastructure. Once installed, our chutes provide a convenient and hygienic method for waste disposal, eliminating the need for manual handling and reducing the risk of cross-contamination and odors.

class="SLC_pr SLC_w1"><h2 style="display:inline;" class="prdDescHeadCard" onclick="productdescpop(151604947)">Product Description</h2><span id="descidrbtn_151604947" data-itemid="151604947" onclick="productdescpop(151604947)" class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">Introducing Aakaar Industries' Organic Waste Compost Machine: the ultimate solution for sustainable waste management. Our compost machine revolutionizes the way organic waste is handled, offering a simple, efficient, and eco-friendly process to convert organic waste into nutrient-rich compost.
Designed for both residential and commercial use, our compost machine provides a convenient way to manage organic waste on-site. Say goodbye to traditional disposal methods and hello to a greener, more sustainable approach. With our compost machine, you can turn kitchen scraps, garden waste, and other organic materials into valuable compost right in your own backyard or facility.
The key to our compost machine's success lies in its innovative design and advanced technology. Equipped with cutting-edge features, such as automatic mixing and aeration, our machine accelerates the composting process, producing high-quality compost in a fraction of the time compared to traditional methods. Plus, its us <span class="SLC_imgc SLC_c1 SLC_f16 SLC_fwb SLC_gap5 SLC_cp filledDescHover"></span></span><div id="desceditarea_151604947" data-itemid="151604947" class="dropdescPop"></div></div></div> "Established in the year 2018 at Chinchwad, Maharashtra. we “Aakaar Engineering” are a Sole Proprietorship based firm, engaged as the foremost Manufacturer, Exporter, Supplier and Service Provider of Garbage Chute System, Debris chutes, Waste Compost Machines, Organic Waste Composter, Industrial Fabrication, Linen chutes, Organic Waste Converter, etc. We partner with our customers and communities to manage and reduce waste from collection to disposal while recovering valuable resources and creating clean, renewable energy.
As Aakaar Engineering with our motive “Efficient Quality”, we actively uphold customer satisfaction as our ultimate target in our waste management. With our experience, infrastructure, specialized staff and the confidence inherited from our previous accomplishments; we are, proudly, the emerging company of our sector. class="desc SLC_wwbw SLC_pr SLC_brs1 SLC_cp filledDescHover">Aakaar Engineering is an emerging company based in Pune which provides solutions for Solid Waste Management with composting. "Established in the year 2018 at Chinchwad, Maharashtra. we “Aakaar Engineering” are a Sole Proprietorship based firm, engaged as the foremost Manufacturer, Exporter, Supplier and Service Provider of Garbage Chute System, Debris chutes, Waste Compost Machines, Organic Waste Composter, Industrial Fabrication, Linen chutes, Organic Waste Converter, etc. We partner with our customers and communities to manage and reduce waste from collection to disposal while recovering valuable resources and creating clean, renewable energy.
As Aakaar Engineering with our motive “Efficient Quality”, we actively uphold customer satisfaction as our ultimate target in our waste management. With our experience, infrastructure, specialized staff and the confidence inherited from our previous accomplishments; we are, proudly, the emerging company of our sector.
